content.rendered:
You must have heard so much about the need to invest, that you are tired of hearing it. The truth is, investment knowledge pays the best interest. Investment can be likened to seeds which when planted can yield more proceeds. The day you plant seed is not the same day you eat the fruit.

Farmers do not work all their lives to gather seeds without planting. No matter how much they have, their major success is not just in harvest but the ability to plant seeds and patiently wait for the proceeds which give them more returns. 

The farmers proceeds multiplies when he makes them work for him and not just him working for them. Money is like the farmer’s seed; you get money when you offer your time and service but you can equally get more money when you let the money work while you devote your time and sacrifice into something else.

The big lie many have believed over the years is that investment can only be done when you get to a certain stage in life, those who hold on to this believe wait for that perfect day to invest which unfortunately may never come.

The best time to invest was yesterday, the next best time is TODAY, and the worst time is tomorrow – Randell Tiongson

The key to the better life which you aspire is in that which you live now. Treat your money as a worker, if you have to work for it, let it work for you too. The best time to invest is now. 

Click here to learn more about our investment plans
